snippet: Two months after 14-year-old Gina DeJesus vanished in 2004, the son of the suspect in her kidnapping interviewed her mother while a college journalism student for a local community newspaper.
abstract: Two months after 14-year-old Gina DeJesus vanished in 2004, the son of the suspect in her kidnapping interviewed her mother while a college journalism student for a local community newspaper.

headline.main: Son of Cleveland Kidnapping Suspect Wrote About Missing Girl in 2004
